system.description: Do something flashy, cool, or impressive, usually – but not exclusively – with your weapon.
system.detail: Do something flashy, cool, or impressive, usually (but not exclusively) with your weapon, like shooting a very small or rapidly moving target, shooting someone’s hat off or their weapon out of their hand, knocking someone out by throwing a gun at them, performing an acrobatic flourish with a sword, throwing a spear to pin a fleeing target to the ground, and so on.
